BauV.name: Bauarbeiterschutzverordnung (Construction Workers Protection Ordinance)
BauV.description: Ordinance concerning the safety and health protection of workers on construction sites. Covers various aspects of construction safety, including scaffolding, excavations, demolition, and use of machinery.

EKAV.name: Elektrotechnische  Arbeitnehmerschutzverordnung 2011 (Electrical Engineering Employee Protection Ordinance 2011)
EKAV.description: Ordinance regarding safety regulations for electrical work activities. Covers requirements for qualified electricians, safety procedures, and protective equipment.

REACH.name: REACH Regulation (Registration, Evaluation, Authorisation and Restriction of Chemicals)
REACH.description: Although a European regulation, REACH is directly applicable in the Netherlands and has significant implications for workplace safety, especially concerning the handling and management of chemical substances. The linked page on wetten.overheid.nl is the NL national interpretation / implementation.  It covers the registration, evaluation, authorisation and restriction of chemical substances to ensure a high level of protection of human health and the environment.

Warenwetbesluit machines.name: Warenwetbesluit machines 2016
Warenwetbesluit machines.description: This implements the Machinery Directive and is very relevant to workplace safety where machines are used.  It lays down the requirements that machines must meet to be placed on the market and put into service, ensuring safety and health protection for workers.

DGUV Vorschrift 1.name: Grunds채tze der Pr채vention
DGUV Vorschrift 1.description: DGUV Vorschrift 1 outlines the basic principles of prevention for occupational safety and health. It covers the responsibilities of employers and employees, risk assessments, first aid, and other essential aspects of a safe working environment. While issued by the DGUV (German Social Accident Insurance), it has a legal basis and is widely recognized and enforced as a standard for workplace safety.

BildscharbV.name: Verordnung 체ber Sicherheit und Gesundheitsschutz bei der Arbeit an Bildschirmger채ten
BildscharbV.description: This regulation (Bildschirmarbeitsverordnung) specifically addresses the safety and health protection of employees working with display screen equipment (VDTs). It covers ergonomic requirements, workstation design, breaks, and eye exams.
